tickets.title: Update home page hero section to display BELLONAAAAAA
tickets.description:
Replace the main hero heading with 'BELLONAAAAAA' using the existing aurora gradient effect.

**Changes:**
- Modify the HeroSection component in src/app/(logged-out)/home/components/hero-section.tsx
- Replace the h1 content that currently reads 'Your <AuroraText>Tech Partner</AuroraText> as a Service' with 'BELLONAAAAAA'
- Apply the same aurora gradient effect (colors: ['#10B981', '#22c55e', '#34D399', '#059669']) to the new text
- Keep all other elements in their current positions: badge, subtitle, and Contact Us button
- Maintain all existing animations and styling (motion effects, spacing, responsive breakpoints)

**Acceptance Criteria:**
✅ Hero section displays 'BELLONAAAAAA' as the main heading
✅ Text uses the aurora gradient effect matching the current design
✅ All animations and transitions work as expected
✅ Responsive design maintained across mobile, tablet, and desktop
✅ Badge, subtitle, and CTA button remain unchanged
✅ No TypeScript errors or type issues
✅ Component builds successfully with bun run build
✅ Passes lint check with bun run lint
